mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_classify (classify_id, classify_name, classify_note, last_classify_id, is_deleted, create_by, gmt_create, last_modified_by, gmt_modified, version) values (#{classifyId}, #{classifyName}, #{classifyNote}, #{lastClassifyId}, 0, #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update t_sys_classify set classify_name = #{classifyName}, classify_note = #{classifyNote}, last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, gmt_modified = now(), version = version + 1 where classify_id = #{classifyId} and version = #{version}
update t_sys_classify set is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{updateUserId}, version = version + 1 where classify_id = #{classifyId}
mapper.select: select a.classify_id, a.classify_name, a.version, b.classify_id classify_ids, b.classify_name classify_names, b.version versions from t_sys_classify a left join t_sys_classify b on b.is_deleted = 0 and b.last_classify_id = a.classify_id and b.last_classify_id != 0 where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.last_classify_id = 0 order by a.gmt_create
select classify_name classifyName, classify_note classifyNote from t_sys_classify where classify_id = #{classifyId}
select count(*) from t_sys_classify where is_deleted = 0 and last_classify_id = #{classifyId}
select last_classify_id from t_sys_classify where classify_id = #{classifyId}
